boardgame.name: Fog of Love
boardgame.description: Fog of Love is a game for two players. You will create and play two vivid characters who meet, fall in love and face the challenge of making an unusual relationship work._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Playing Fog of Love is like being in a romantic comedy: roller-coaster rides, awkward situations, lots of laughs and plenty of difficult compromises to make._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Much as in a real relationship, goals might be at odds. You can try to change, keep being relentless or even secretly decide to be a Heartbreaker. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s your choice._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The happily ever after won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t be certain, but whatever way your zigzag romance unfolds, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll always end up with a story full of surprises _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; guaranteed to raise a smile!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

The game itself is in very good condition. #General: All of my games come from a passionate boardgaming household with no pets and no smoking Usually they are packed with sorting boxes and zip bags to ease and shorten ahe setup and break down time I only ship insured! #Versand nach Deutschland (Post/DHL, alle Preise in Euro): Einschreiben (Versicherung = 20,00 €): Großbrief (bis 0,5 kg): 4 € Maxibrief (bis 1,0 kg): 5 € Maxibrief (bis 2,0 kg): 7,5 € Zusatzversicherung: 2€ pro 100€ Versicherung Paket (bis 2,0 kg): 5 € Paket (bis 10,0 kg): 6 € Paket (bis 20,0 kg): 11 € Paket (bis 31,5 kg): 13 € Bis 500 € versichert #International Shipping (DHL, all prices in Euro):: Inscribed letter (insured up to 35,00 €) Letter (up to 0,5 kg): 6,5 € worldwide Letter (up to 1,0 kg): 11 € worldwide Letter (up to 2,0 kg): 21 € worldwide ### extra insurance: add 2 € for every additional 100,00 € Parcel (up to 2,0 kg): 15 € (only EU) --_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; insured up to 500 € Parcel (up to 5,0 kg): 17 € (EU) or 30 € (Rest of Europe) or 35 € (USA/CAN) oder 45 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 10,0 kg): 22 € (EU) or 35 € (Rest of Europe) or 50 € (USA/CAN) oder 60 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 20,0 kg): 32 € (EU) or 50 € (Rest of Europe) or 70 € (USA/CAN) oder 95 € (Rest of World) Parcel (up to 31,5 kg): 42 € (EU) or 55 € (Rest of Europe) or 95 € (USA/CAN) oder 125 € (Rest of World) Insured up to 500,00 € worldwide NO ADDITIONAL FEES FOR PACKAGE AND WRAPPING! #Payment: Within Euro-zone the EU-standard-bank-transfer (SEPA, IBAN/BIC) is recommended, it´s quick, save and causes no fees. Paypal is certainly also possible, fees within EU are 0,35 Euro + 1,9% of the total. Worldwide (outside the EURO-zone) Paypal is recommended. Since October 2011 PP-fees are 0,35 Euro + (from 3,9% to 5,2%) of the total. For nearly all countries outside Europe, apart from USA and Canada (both 3,9%), the rate is 5.2%. Paypal does not allow uninsured shipment above 25 Euro and shipments to any other address than the one submitted with the payment. Thank you Daniel
